articles.title: How American Tax Breaks Brought a Chinese Solar Energy Giant to Ohio - Bloomberg
articles.description: The Inflation Reduction Act restored American manufacturing jobs – and gave China an opportunity to extend its dominance in some clean energy technologies.
articles.content: Nestled among the corn fields of Pataskala, Ohio, Illuminate USAs sprawling new solar factory is buzzing. Hundreds of freshly hired local employees are hoisting pallets, soldering equipment and inspe… [+477 chars]

articles.author: Andrea Kane
articles.title: 5 tips to wean yourself off added sugar - CNN
articles.description: Americans eat too much added sugar. But it’s hard to cut back because sugar lurks in many of our foods. These five tips can help.
